// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class ParallelAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SequenceNode(
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.Any(),
                new ActionNode(() => this.SearchForEnemy(), "SearchForEnemy()"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.ListenForSound(), "ListenForSound()"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.CheckRadar(), "CheckRadar()")),
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.All(),
                new ActionNode(() => this.AimAtTarget(this.Target), "AimAtTarget(.Target)"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.ChargeWeapon(), "ChargeWeapon()")),
            new ParallelNode(new Crisp.Runtime.ParallelPolicy.N(2),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally1), "NotifyAlly(.Ally1)"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally2), "NotifyAlly(.Ally2)"),
                new ActionNode(() => this.NotifyAlly(this.Ally3), "NotifyAlly(.Ally3)")),
            new ActionNode(() => this.ExecuteAttack(), "ExecuteAttack()"));
    }
}
